problem.markdown:
>>Which of the lateral force-resisting systems tends to be the most flexible, meaning it deflects the most under a given load?<< (x) moment-resisting frame ( ) braced frame ( ) shearwall
[explanation] Moment-resisting frames tend to be the most flexible since it is difficult to create fully moment-resisting connections and the members of the frames tend to be long and slender. [explanation]
